title-group.article-title: Excelsior College’s English as a Second Language Writing Online Workshop (ESL-WOW)

contrib.aff: Arizona State University/American University of Kuwait.

bio.p: Michelle Kunkel (mkunkel@auk.edu.kw) earned her MTESOL degree from Arizona State University. She received a Fulbright grant to teach at La Faculté des Sciences et Technologies de l’Éducation et de la Formation (FASTEF), the national teacher training college of Senegal, in 2015. Currently, she is an instructor in the Intensive English Program at the American University of Kuwait.
